question: فَبَشَّرْنَاهَا
answer: Then We gave her glad tidings

question: وَبَشِيرٌ
answer: and a bearer of glad tidings

question: وَيَسْتَخْلِفُ
answer: And my Lord will give succession

question: رَبِّي
answer: And my Lord will give succession

question: لَرَجَمْنَاكَ
answer: surely we would have stoned you

question: مَرْجُوًّا
answer: the one in whom hope was placed

question: وَتَرْحَمْنِي
answer: and You have mercy on me

question: اسْتَطَعْتُ
answer: as much as I am able

question: أَنُلْزِمُكُمُوهَا
answer: should We compel you (to accept) it

question: لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمْ
answer: surely will pay them in full

question: لَمُوَفُّوهُمْ
answer: will surely pay them in full
